name: [City Name]
mission: As the government, it is our responsibility to ensure the equity of our city across all aspects. All major resources are distributed from us to you through the systems we have in place, making sure that everyone has what they need. Food will be provided from community run farms and gardens, and distributed through government owned grocery stores. The same goes for other community made goods and stores. Additionally, clean energy is provided to all citizens through our universal energy plan.
